# Open Data Product Specification, ODPS - Linux Foundation

Discover how to transform your data strategy with the Open Data Product Specification (ODPS), driving value and innovation in the modern data economy.

## Overview of ODPS

[What is ODPS](https://opendataproducts.org/#What-isOpen): This page provides a comprehensive introduction to the Open Data Product Specification, outlining its purpose and significance in the data economy.

[Short history of ODPS](https://blog.opendataproducts.org/is-open-data-product-specification-the-swagger-of-the-data-economy-fe2349e39ea7): A brief overview of the development and evolution of the Open Data Product Specification, highlighting key milestones.

## Versions of ODPS

[Versions](https://opendataproducts.org/#versions): This section details the different versions of the Open Data Product Specification, including major updates and changes.

[ODPS 3.1](https://opendataproducts.org/v3.1/): Information on the features and improvements introduced in version 3.1 of the Open Data Product Specification.

[ODPS development version](https://opendataproducts.org/dev/): Insights into the latest development version of the Open Data Product Specification, including ongoing changes and enhancements.

[Open Data Product Specification 2.0](https://opendataproducts.org/v2.0/): An overview of version 2.0, detailing its features and contributions to the data landscape.

[Open Data Product Specification 2.1](https://opendataproducts.org/v2.1/): A summary of the updates and new features introduced in version 2.1.

## Use Cases and Applications

[Use cases](https://opendataproducts.org/#userCase): This page outlines various practical applications of the Open Data Product Specification across different industries and sectors.

[Scaling Smart City Interoperability](https://opendataproducts.org/#): A discussion on how ODPS can enhance interoperability in smart city initiatives, promoting better data sharing and collaboration.

## Community and Partnerships

[Testimonials](https://opendataproducts.org/#testmonail): Feedback and endorsements from organizations and individuals who have successfully implemented the Open Data Product Specification.

[Reach out to forge an exciting partnership!](https://opendataproducts.org/#contact): An invitation for organizations interested in collaborating on projects related to the Open Data Product Specification.

[Join the conversation!](mailto:jarkko@vimo.fi): A call to engage with the community and participate in discussions surrounding the Open Data Product Specification.

## Development and Resources

[Development](https://opendataproducts.org/#development): Information on the ongoing development efforts for the Open Data Product Specification, including contributions from the community.

[Get familiar with the latest ODPS production version](https://opendataproducts.org/v3.1): Guidance on how to access and utilize the most recent production version of the Open Data Product Specification.

[YAML Schema](https://opendataproducts.org/v3.1/schema/odps.yaml): Details on the YAML schema used within the Open Data Product Specification, including its structure and usage.

[See the source files.](https://opendataproducts.org/dev): Access to the source files related to the Open Data Product Specification for further exploration and understanding.

[See the issues.](https://github.com/Open-Data-Product-Initiative/dev/issues): A link to the issue tracker for the Open Data Product Specification, where users can report bugs or suggest improvements.

## Governance and Policies

[Trademark Policy](https://lfprojects.org/policies/trademark-policy/): Information regarding the trademark policies associated with the Open Data Product Specification.

[Terms of Use](https://lfprojects.org/policies/terms-of-use/): The terms and conditions governing the use of the Open Data Product Specification.

[Project Policies](https://lfprojects.org/policies/): A summary of the policies that govern the Open Data Product Specification project.

[Cookie Policy](https://lfprojects.org/cookie-policy/): Details on the cookie policy related to the Open Data Product Specification website.

## Additional Resources

[Explore More](https://github.com/Open-Data-Product-Initiative/odps-knowledge-base): A prompt to discover more resources and information related to the Open Data Product Specification.

[See the full specification.](https://opendataproducts.org/v3.0): Access to the complete specification document for the Open Data Product Specification.

[See the full specification, development version.](https://opendataproducts.org/dev): A link to the full development version of the Open Data Product Specification.

[See the source files.](https://github.com/Open-Data-Product-Initiative/dev): Another access point for the source files related to the Open Data Product Specification.

[See the issues.](https://github.com/Open-Data-Product-Initiative/v3.0/issues): A link to view issues related to the Open Data Product Specification.

[Some examples created with ODPS and JSON Schema.](https://github.com/Open-Data-Product-Initiative/odps-examples): A showcase of examples demonstrating the application of ODPS in conjunction with JSON Schema.

[Github home](https://github.com/Open-Data-Product-Initiative): The GitHub repository for the Open Data Product Specification, where users can find code, documentation, and contribute to the project.

## Organizations Involved

[BASF](https://www.basf.com/global/en/who-we-are/digitalization): Information about BASF's involvement with the Open Data Product Specification.

[Ferris AI](https://ferris.ai/): Details on how Ferris AI is utilizing the Open Data Product Specification.

[iSpatial Techno Solutions](https://www.ispatialtec.com/): Insights into iSpatial Techno Solutions' contributions to the Open Data Product Specification.

[Nordic Institute for Interoperability Solutions](https://www.niis.org/): Overview of the Nordic Institute's role in promoting interoperability through the Open Data Product Specification.

[Beyond Civic](https://beyondcivic.com/): Information on Beyond Civic's engagement with the Open Data Product Specification.

[VesoAI](https://vesoai.com/): Details on VesoAI's applications of the Open Data Product Specification.

## Latest Updates

[Latest stories published on Open Data Product Specification](https://blog.opendataproducts.org/latest): A collection of the most recent articles and updates related to the Open Data Product Specification.

[Top stories published by Open Data Product Specification ...](https://blog.opendataproducts.org/archive/2025): Highlights of significant stories and developments in the Open Data Product Specification community.

[Data Mesh](https://blog.opendataproducts.org/tagged/data-mesh): An exploration of the Data Mesh concept and its relationship with the Open Data Product Specification.

## Conclusion

This structured summary provides a comprehensive overview of the Open Data Product Specification, its versions, use cases, community involvement, governance, and additional resources. For further details, please refer to the respective links provided.
